name: acid3lib - A Cute ID3 Library
short_description: acid3lib is A Cute ID3 Library whose aim it is to end the version struggle with the ID3v2 format and provide standard-compliant, reliable and easy-to-use Java ID3v2 support. Supports all versions and features such as compression, unsychronisation and CRCs
